.. _wx.html.HtmlWindowInterface.HTMLCursor:

==========================================================================================================================================
|phoenix_title|  **wx.html.HtmlWindowInterface.HTMLCursor**
==========================================================================================================================================



The `HTMLCursor` enumeration provides the following values:



================================================================================ ================================================================================
**Description**                                                                  **Value**
================================================================================ ================================================================================
HTMLCursor_Default                                                               Standard mouse cursor (typically an arrow)                      
HTMLCursor_Link                                                                  Cursor shown over links.                      
HTMLCursor_Text                                                                  Cursor shown over selectable text.                      
================================================================================ ================================================================================

|
